resources.string: Enter part of full name, contact type, job, title, some part of event date (several values enter by comma, regexp supported):

No events were found in your address book. To display events (birthdays, anniversaries, name days) they must be filled in your contacts cards or imported by applications installed on your smartphone (Google, Skype, VK, …)
"No accounts were found or you did not give access to them"
"No visible calendars were found or you did not give access to them"
"No events found. Check the \"%1$s\" and \"%2$s\" items in program settings"
No access to contacts. Check application permissions
No access to contacts. Check application permissions

Thank you for installing this program. Although most functions are configured as informatively and minimally annoyingly as possible, it is recommended that you check the application settings. For example, there you can enable notifications of upcoming events or set parameters for widgets. Enjoy your use!
Scan only these accounts for events
Use standard labels to detect birthday events
Contacts events with this label will be identified as birthdays (by comma)
Rules for importing calendar events to birthdays
Enter contact name recognition rules from calendar event title (several values enter by | ). Rule must contains tag [name] surrounded by other text (optional):
Use full calendar event date for event (not only day and month)
Use standard labels to detect anniversary events
Contacts events with this label will be identified as anniversaries (by comma)
Use standard labels to detect name days events
Contacts events with this label will be identified as name days (by comma)
Use standard labels to detect crowning events
Contacts events with this label will be identified as crownings (by comma)
Use standard labels to detect death anniversary events
Contacts events with this label will be identified as death anniversaries (by comma)
Contacts events with this label will be identified as other events (by comma)
Contacts events with this label will be identified as this event (by comma)
Use full date info for event (not only day and month)
What kind of events to include in list
Mark photos of deceased contacts with mourning tape
Show previous events on top of the events list

string-array.name: pref_List_PrevEvents_entries
string-array.item: Events for 3 previous days but no more one
Events for 3 previous days but no more two

resources.string: First or last name at the beginning
Format of dates displaying in event list and widgets
Additional female names for the correct display of contact icons without a photo
What additional event details to show
Color of day caption for today events
Color of days distance for near events
What event details and widget elements to show
Primary color for widget elements (event captions, age)
Color of age for today events
Color of days count for near events
Color of days count for far events
For how many days events are considered to be nearest
What kind of events to display on this widget

Value 1 means the first event from the list will be starting point, 2 - the second, and so on… You can add to the screen several widgets with different event start indexes to get a desired configuration
Font scale multiplier for age, event distance and under photo info text
If there is too \"narrow\" or \"loose\" for events on the widget, adjust the number of events
To modify widget preferences click on caption of the rightmost event:
How notifications will be looks like
High priority unclosable notifications are always on the top. To hide them click on it

string-array.name: pref_Notifications_Priority_entries
string-array.item: Only summary notification is high priority
All notifications are high priority and unclosable

resources.string: How many days before event to notify
What kind of events to include in notifications
Which actions are available for single notification (up to 3)
Click to show notification for today
What interface to use for questions

string-array.name: pref_Quiz_Interface_entries
string-array.item: Notifications (you can stop at any time and go to look for the right answer)
Dialog (you can not rush to answer, but you cannot look for clues)

resources.string: If something works wrong or you just don\'t know how to tune some app preference this is page for you
Press %1$d more time%2$s to %3$s debug notifications
Show debugging messages (it is recommended to enable it if widgets or events are displayed incorrectly and send it to the application author)
